website_summaries.verdict: An Amazon best seller, this Argan Oil shampoo and conditioner set doubles up to nourish hair strands.
pros: Argan oil plus botanical extracts and oils enhance shine and health of your hair and scalp
Conditioner hydrates hair and leaves it feeling soft and thicker
cons: Some users report scalp irritation or dandruff after using it

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for the Quality!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: ArtNaturals Argan Oil is the best shampoo I have ever purchased in my life. My hair went from being sometimes frizzy, sometimes straight, sometimes in between to easy to manage, straight, super shiny, healthy hair that I have always desired. I get tons of compliments from others and people often ask me what I use because my hair looks so good. I wash my hair three times a week with this shampoo and I don't even need the accompanying conditioner because the shampoo is so moisturizing in and of itself. However, the conditioner does add a little protection and shine when using hair dryers and straighteners. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: FelineFriendly

customer_reviews.title: My hair is never been so healthy
customer_reviews.text: My hair has never been so healthy. It used to break at the ends so frequently despite trims every 2 mon. Now, it already feels so healthy. I’ve only used the shampoo and conditioner twice over 4 days and already notice a great difference. My hair is usually very frizzy for up to 10-14ish hours after washing even with defrizz products put in. Using this product my hair drys so nicely. I love it. Totally hooked. Also now I use a organic leave in organic serum I made myself of argan oil, vegetable glycerin, sandlewood essential oil, and lemon essential oil.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo and conditioner really does help your hair from falling out. I have used it three times. I bought it because when I would run my hands through my hair there would be several strands of hair on my hand. Now when I do the some thing I get no strands or maybe one or two on my hands. I attribute it to this product. However, I was told it could be my hair has just stopped shedding. I guess your hair can shed more due to stress and various other factors, but even though I can't say this product was 100% the reason my hair stop shedding I feel confident it helped..
customer_reviews.author: Lighthouse Rita

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way, worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I hesitated to buy it as the price seemed about double what I would pay for shampoo regularly. The amazing thing is that a little shampoo goes a long way its not diluted down like the stuff you buy at the big box store. It makes my hair feel so soft and light. I can barely smell any scent to this which I guess is a good thing, but I like the smell of some shampoos.
customer_reviews.author: Bordo

customer_reviews.title: Best shampoo I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely looooove this combo! It was my first time trying it and fell in love with it. Even my hair dresser complemented me on my hair. I have thinner hair and she said how silky and fuller it felt. I love that it does all this without the chemicals. Being the daughter of a hairdresser I have tried tons of shampoos over the years but this definitely tops the list.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Superb product for colored hair
customer_reviews.text: I just love this shampoo/conditioner. I have color treated hair, on top of it being very fine, and this product keeps the color vibrant and my hair feeling thicker and healthier. The scent is very subtle and doesn't clash with any other perfume, cologne like many drugstore brands tend to do. This stuff is rich, a little goes a long way. I have short hair, and use about a nickel size amount of each which is plenty. I bought my first set 10 months ago, and I still have 1/4 left.
customer_reviews.author: M. Linnevers

customer_reviews.title: Husband noticed!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical... but my hair really is softer and smoother after using these products! The shampoo and conditioner have different scents but both are nice. I do wish the conditioner was a bit more...conditioning. I feel like I have to use a LOT to feel it in my hair. I'm going to run out of conditioner long before shampoo. Also, both caps were shattered when I opened the package. Fortunately, the little nubs inside the caps prevented any leakage. Despite those things, I give both 5 stars because my hair looks and feels so much softer and healthier. Even my husband has noticed!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: fine hair has grown over 5 inches
customer_reviews.text: Since I started using Art Natural Moroccan Argan Oil products in October 2016, my thin, fine hair has grown over 5 inches, my gray hair seems non-existent, and the color of my hair is vibrant (I am a strawberry blond). The health of my hair is the best is has ever been! And, if you follow the directions, it takes very little product- so its last long, and the price is excellent. I am a huge fan!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: The best shampoo and conditioner I have ever used! My hair is fine and easily breaks. I was tired of having to keep my hair short because of all the breakage, so I did a little research and found artnaturals. My hair hasn't been this healthy in years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great smell and makes my hair soft
customer_reviews.text: I tried this shampoo and conditional for a few times. It has a great smell and my hair feels soft and nice after washing with this shampoo. It has a feel like when I leave the hairsalon. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: V. Rocks

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with formula change.
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying the shampoo and conditioner for over a year and used to love it. But, the formula has entirely changed. Both the shampoo and conditioner are now a thinner consistency and do not smell the same or as nice as previous products. My previous bottle of conditioner listed Aloe Vera, Rosemary & Argan oil on the front label and now it says Argan Oil, Aloe Vera & Echinacea. I am not happy with the changes and may not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: schep0088

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this shampoo because it was cheaper than the brand I usually get but this has striped my hair really bad. I have long hair that I have to dye a lot because it’s red but it always is healthy. This shampoo and conditioner has made my hair sooo unhealthy. Please don’t buy this if you care for your hair at all!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients listed online don’t match container
customer_reviews.text: I very carefully read the ingredients online before ordering, as I cannot use sulfates OR sodium chloride with my keratin treated hair. I was SO perturbed to receive my order, look at the ingredients on the product itself, which NOW has sodium chloride listed as an ingredient, a very big No-No. 😠 I am returning it. BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Gma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product - Awesome Hair
customer_reviews.text: This product is so amazing. It smells good for sure, but more so it leaves my hair feeling super healthy with added volume. The price seems expensive but it lasts for a long time and it is well worth it. Your hair will feel amazing!
customer_reviews.author: comedicmuse

customer_reviews.title: Great product whole family loves it
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about 6 months we love it. I color my hair so it tends to be dry but this product cleans my hair without over drying. The conditioner moisturizes without leaving an oily residue. My whole family uses it from my husband to the kids. it even smells awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT for more sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I thought for a month I just had bad dandruff or product build up. This gave me horrible dandruff and made my scalp react badly. It was so bad that you could see physical build up at my hair line. My barber said it sounded like I was allergic to it. I stopped using the product and the problem went away. So even though this is hyped as an "ultra moisturizing wonder", please note that that does not mean it will work for anyone. And if you KNOW you have sensitive skin, I would probably stay away from these kinds of shampoos.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: My hair loves this natural set!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo and conditioner set. It's a natural product with good smell, and it works good. It gives my fine straight hair some body and makes it looks healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Does not make your hair grow and will make breakage way worse.
customer_reviews.text: This product did not make my hair grow first of all. Which was why I even purchased this product. And it made my hair break off way more than it was before I used it. I used the shampoo/conditioner for over a month to see the real results from it. So do not use this, its a total scam.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Castevens

customer_reviews.title: So easy to run hands an fingers
customer_reviews.text: I really likly it makes my beard feel so solf an tangel free. So easy to run hands an fingers through
customer_reviews.author: Jack S.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed☹️
customer_reviews.text: I use art naturals black seed shampoo which I get from general store And it is a great shampoo for keeping hair moistures. Unable to go out right now in this pandemic,so I ordered this shampoo cause they don’t have black seed oil ones . I don’t think this is the original product. The consistency of the shampoo is super light Feels like someone mixed a lot of water in it. It made my hair super dry😞 I spent my money on the wrong product 😟😟
customer_reviews.author: Pumba

customer_reviews.title: Actual product has different ingredients from the Amazon description.
customer_reviews.text: Why is the ingredient list here on Amazon different from the actual product? The product I received has a different list of ingredients and includes Aloe. Also actually dries my hair out. I was excited to the this revised product but now it’s delivered via Amazons amazing speedy service, I feel like Art Naturals just ships Amazon whatever it feels like. This has happened to me on other Art Natural products before. The label looks the same but the list of ingredients is different!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie T

customer_reviews.title: CONDITIONER??? I THINK NOT!
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo is decent but holy hell, the conditioner has got to be the worst that I have ever used in my entire life! I wouldn't even call it conditioner. My hair was literally left in dried up matted wet knot after using this. I couldn't even rinse it out really. I feel like it made my hair MORE tangled than the shampoo! I've never purchased a product that literally does the opposite as its intended purpose. I will definitely not be purchasing this product in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Baczynski

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It left my hair really soft and manageable. I used NO additional products before blow drying it made my hair shiny it did not make it look greasy which is a must because I only wash my hair twice a week!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: NOT Organic
customer_reviews.text: This is a misleading product description and despite what the seller says in Q&A it is not Certified Organic. It does not have the symbol anywhere on the packaging. After using it once and breaking out in hives I thoroughly checked the bottles and box (I know, I should have beforehand), and there is no mention of Organic anywhere. Don't buy this if you have skin sensitivity, or, you know, if you hate it when sellers mislead their customers!
customer_reviews.author: RachAch

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: My Wife loves the product. Made a huge difference in how much easier to manage her hair is furthermore it makes hair smell amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I'm nearly done with my first set. I didn't want to review until I had used it quite a bit. I love this shampoo and conditioner. I have curly/wavy hair. These products really help with frizzy hair. More importantly they don't leave my hair greasy or heavy with product. I use it every day and it's brilliant for keeping the frizz down. I'll continue to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excessive dandruff & hairloss
customer_reviews.text: These shampoo cause me excessive hairloss.Which I did not have after 2 times of using it.I usually wash my hair one or twice per week depending on how oily it gets.I just can't continue using it because it has caused me serious problems with my scalp.It has also caused me excessive dandruff and it burns my scalp due to the dandruff The picture I took is after washing my hair and drying it that's how much hair I started loosing after using this shampoo the end time.Stay Away from this shampoo if you also have sensitive skin.I think i do better with Head & Shoulder shampoo.I hate the hair conditioner as well.I do not recommend this Shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Yee

customer_reviews.title: Made my hair feel dry and not shiny.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product’s scent and it seems like it should be very moisturizing but it is not for having Argan oil in it. After shampooing, my hair feels like hay and so dry, probably stripped of natural oils. Once I apply the conditioner, it feels a little better but until then my hair feels stripped. I have thin, longer straight hair that is very healthy. I tried this to keep it healthy and I think this product does the opposite. I have used other products by Ion that make my hair very soft and shiny, even on color treated hair.
customer_reviews.author: Diane W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for dry curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I began using the shampoo and conditioner over a month ago. My hair is very curly, thick and long and I noticed my hair is so much easier to comb through right after using the conditioner. I have to wash my hair daily otherwise it is a tangled mess and these products are gentle enough to use each day. The shampoo and conditioner have a nice scent that is not overwhelming but clean and fresh. I recommend both the shampoo and conditioner for soft and manageable hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shampoo/conditioner.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been trying to find a “clean” shampoo that would help with my daughter’s thick hair that gets build up and then I cannot run a brush through without tears! This shampoo not only smells good, but it really is clean and leaves your hair feeling naturally healthy! I LOVE it and will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: fos_sin

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok, won’t order again
customer_reviews.text: I like the subtle scent of each (the shampoo smelled a little differently than the conditioner). The shampoo does not soap up very well. I have to use a lot to get it to be sudsy. The conditioner is fine but thick so it’s difficult to get it out. The conditioner would be much better off with either a pump or have the top of the bottle be wider so that it can be placed upside down when not in use. The bottle has a small top and easily tips over when placed upside down. All in all it’s ok but I don’t plan to order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, hair fell out.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product for over a month and it made my hair fall out. While I normally have thin hair, this product caused handfuls of hair to fall as I rinsed it out and noticeable bald areas in my scalp. It also caused my scalp to itch when I left the shampoo in for the recommended amount of time. I am disappointed that this product did not work for me as it smelled great and had glowing reviews. As soon as I switched shampoo, I did not have any issue with my hair coming out. I do not think I was allergic, however, I do know this did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It seems to work!
customer_reviews.text: After my first week (5 uses), the shampoo and conditioner very obviously clean my hair and make it look thicker. My hair also seems to not get as oily as quickly as it did prior to using this combination. This is my first use of an Argan oil shampoo/conditioner, so I can't compare it to other products. And because it is early days, I have no experience in it encouraging new hair growth--thus only the 4 stars. As a shampoo and conditioner, I believe it is a 5 star product and I plan to continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: don graf

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Slow shipping.
customer_reviews.text: It was irritating that it took so long to get here BUT it’s honestly a really good product. I permed my hair a few months ago and it hasn’t been the same. I won’t say that this has completely revived my hair because I’ve only used it once, I definitely see a difference after one wash. I’ve been using L’Oréal Elvive and this product is better.
customer_reviews.author: NML

customer_reviews.title: Extreme Hair Loss
customer_reviews.text: I got this product to possibly help combat my hair shedding as much, but ever since I started using this product my hair has been falling out excessively. When I shower, clumps of hair come out in my hands. When I wake up in the morning, my pillow and pajamas are covered in hair. It's gotten so bad that I cannot even wear my hair down because it will end up everywhere. I am fortunate to have pretty thick hair so I have not experienced the bald spots that some other reviewers had mentioned but it is still insane to me that a "natural" shampoo and conditioner could cause this type of damage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful shampoo/conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this based on the great reviews. It is really the worst shampoo/conditioner I have used. I tried it for 3 weeks, hoping it would take time to like it or it would get better. It was not hydrating and left my easy to style hair, unmanageable. Did not lather and did not wash out.
customer_reviews.author: S. Roth

customer_reviews.title: I used to LOVE this shampoo, but maybe ingredients changed?
customer_reviews.text: I used to LOVE this shampoo. It would make my hair soooo soft and silky! But with my most recent purchase, my hair has been frizzy, dry, and no amount of conditioner seemed to be able to soften my hair? I used to only use literally a dime amount to condition my hair, and now am using literally a palm's worth! I haven't done anything different to my hair, so I'm confused and disappointed...perhaps I got a defect?
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Super soft and moisturizing.
customer_reviews.text: I've been doing no poo for several years, and noticet a lot of split ends and breakage over the past few months. Decided i would switch back, but didnt want all the chemicals and silicones, so I gave this a try. So far so good. The shampoo leaves my hair a little dry feeling after I rinse it out, but the conditioner softens and moisturizes taking away any feeling of dryness. Ive only used it a few times, but I like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: KeriW.

customer_reviews.title: Best shampoo and conditioner ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best shampoo and conditioner I have ever used. I have natural curly fine hair and have tried so many different products that gave me disappointing results. With all of the other shampoos and conditioners I've used I would have to use a leave in conditioner, curl cream and gel to get results somewhat close to what I was trying to achieve. With these products I only have to wash and condition. Then I use a little bit of the same wash out conditioner as a leave in. My curls have never looked so good. My hair also is not weighed down. I just love this stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: S.Katz

customer_reviews.title: Product change
customer_reviews.text: Please stop changing the products. This used to be great shampoo but is now nothing like the original.
customer_reviews.author: JohnKy

customer_reviews.title: Watery shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these for about a year, but individually, never in a set. The conditioner seems the same. They both have the same scent as previous purchases. However, the shampoo is very watery. Like to the point of feeling like half of it spills out of my hand as I try to get it up to my head. The label has also changed, but still said made in the USA. I loved these shampoo and conditioners, but I feel like my shampoo got watered down, I even compared to what was left in my old bottle and there's a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Megpie

customer_reviews.title: Bottles not sealed
customer_reviews.text: Both the shampoo and conditioner came without plastic wrap on nozzle. When I opened the bottles, both of them had the little sealed for protection tab completely off as though they had been opened before. Makes you wonder if it’s the product you intended to purchase or if the bottle has been refilled with something else. When you order hair products they should come completely sealed!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Itchy Scalp
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a natural option for my hair and haven't specifically been impressed with it. Would only recommend using the shampoo once a week because it strips EVERYTHING from your hair and it does take a lot of shampoo because it doesn't lather much. Conditioner is nice though! Since using I find the that first day after washing I find my scalp really dy and SUPER itchy most likely due to the shampoo washing the oils from my scalp so I would definitely suggest if using to following up with leave in conditioner and rub it in really good.
customer_reviews.author: Firecase95

customer_reviews.title: BEST HAIR PRODUCTS I'VED USED
customer_reviews.text: Listen, I never felt so excited to review a haiR pRoduct until I bought this. I was like hmm, Argan Oil, and other nonharmful ingredients ok let's give it a try. POOF, kept my hair safe, clean, curly and relentlessly SOFT for a whole 3 MONTHS now. I am not naturally curly hair or soft hair but ever since I've started to use these 2 products my hair was basically BLESSED by God himself. Guys or girls, I highly recommend this. It is also very genuine and straightforward about what they use in their products. BUY ITTTTT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Don't think, just buy it
customer_reviews.text: OH, my gosh !! I've bought SO many products to make my hair softer, and nothing worked quite as well as I wanted it to. Literally day one of using this shampoo/conditioner combo and I noticed a difference. My hair feels silky smooth now (well, not so much the ends, but I think i'm just due for a trim), and I 100% am going to buy this product exclusively. I cannot go on enough about how much I love what its done for my hair. I definitely recommend this product ! Simply amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: ArtNaturals shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I have been having problems with brittle hair and it breaks and falls easily. I was searching for a natural shampoo that will help me and I came across this one. I recently started using it and I I like the natural soft smell. I also like the way it makes my hair feel, nice and soft I use both the shampoo and the conditioner
customer_reviews.author: rdj

customer_reviews.title: Good, most of the time.
customer_reviews.text: The first 4 times I bought this shampoo, it was great. The last time, it still works, but is really watered down. It still works, but I've used more than normal because it's so thinned down that you can't really control how much comes out of the bottle. It still works. My hair is still soft, but I've used it about 3 times faster than I normally would have.
customer_reviews.author: Lance W. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Astounding
customer_reviews.text: Seems to bolster hair strength. I need no additional styling product. My hair never feels greased or oiled. A truly fantastic, marvelous, almost certainly a whimsical product of faery magic. But... I'm a scientist. I, in part, go through the professional views and results of scientific research. Individual ingredient research, counter indicators between ingredients, etcetera. The reviews nearly sold me. The research is provocative and the results are remarkable, reliable and undeniable in my instance. I suggest you try it once. Perhaps twice. Then, welcome to the club. 🥂
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: great shampoo and conditioner
customer_reviews.text: It makes my hair feel so clean and not weighed down at all. Be aware it says to conditioner your hair from the roots down and trust me it doesn't make your hair feel greasy by doing this. I have color treated hair and it doesn't seem to make it fade any faster than it normally does. Actually coloring my hair again this week so I'll update if I notice any changes with that.
customer_reviews.author: Ducky

customer_reviews.title: Nice smelling set, good for damage
customer_reviews.text: I have dark blonde hair with highlights. My hair has been fairly damaged the last few years. I’ve tried a lot of shampoos, even professional salon products, with varied results. I found this one here, and I’m not sorry I bought it. My hair is “better” than before I started using it. However I’ve had to use more shampoo than normal because it doesn’t lather the best. Maybe that’s normal for this shampoo. The scent is nice. I have had a few compliments from the man in my life. He keeps sniffing it, so that’s a good sign haha I will likely keep using this product. Maybe I will even buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: bralphx

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Ingredients Listed
customer_reviews.text: This is false advertising I looked through the ingredients posted and even searched for the word “fragrance” because I’m allergic to artificial scents and nowhere was it stated that there was fragrance added in both the shampoo and conditioner. The ingredients listed don’t include everything in the products. I don’t like leaving negative reviews for products unless it’s absolutely necessary but as someone who specifically shops for unscented products because of how it negatively affects my skin this was VERY upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: The best I’ve tried!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a shampoo that doesn’t leave my hair feeling dry. I’ve used head and shoulders and all the tea tree shampoos out there and still, I was left with light dandruff. I decided to try this shampoo on my journey to find the right one, and I can finally say I’ve found my new shampoo and conditioner. This set makes my hair feel super soft, smells great and my dandruff probably is going away.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: After one wash and conditioning my hair was silky soft and it lasted a few days. My hair felt lighter, cleaner. Another aspect of this product is that it smells more like grapefruit while washing rather than the coconut I was expecting. So, the only negative, warranting 4 stars, was that even with working up a lather I still had to use a ton of shampoo and my hair is only about shoulder length and thinned.
customer_reviews.author: Winter Woods

customer_reviews.title: Quality, value and intergenerationl appeal!
customer_reviews.text: In my 50s I started to notice my hair thining a bit and looking damaged I discovered ArtNaturals Argan Oil. When I noticed my teenage sons using "Mom's Shampoo" and demanding their own supply I was really impressed. One of them has dandruff problems and the other, an unruly mop and both said it helped. Great value, especially if we can all use the same product!
customer_reviews.author: Lobster

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shampoo/Conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I've been using sulfate filled shampoos and conditioners my whole life without even realizing it. My hair, as of recent has been really dry and so I decided to see if changing to this sulfate free argan oil product would make a difference. I've only used it once so far and I can already tell the difference! My hair looked and felt smoother coming out the shower, and an hour after letting my hair air dry it still looked good! i had minimal frizz and my hair didn't look very dry, and that's only from using it once! I expect great results by the time I'm a week or two into using this product.
customer_reviews.author: SlickRick

customer_reviews.title: Smells Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I just want to start out by saying, I would continue to use this shampoo, based on the smell alone! It’s seriously that good. My husband used it before me and I couldn’t get over how absolutely amazing he smelled after using! I’m very big on smells and products I used smelling good and this one is a winner! Mine and my husbands hair has been super soft and definitely moisturized since starting use, my hair feels fuller and silky, which isn’t usually an easy combo to obtain. The price is right for the combo as well— especially since a little goes a long way! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Raspberry Beret

customer_reviews.title: Photo is deceitful but product is worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this shampoo and conditioner combo. The scent itself is so heavenly my husband has told me I'm not allowed to switch brands and my hair feels as silky smooth as if I've just left the salon after every wash. That being said, the picture is extremely deceiving and the bottles are nowhere near that wide. They're the same width as any regular shampoo/conditioner bottle you would typically purchase in a store. I was a bit disappointed the first time I got these as I thought I was getting a lot more product for my money's worth, but the benefits quickly turned my mood around.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I am a wash, fluff, and go person and keep a short no-fuss hairdo. I also stopped dying my hair and let my natural silvery strands show. This shampoo and conditioner work well on my hair. The shampoo is a little runnier than the shampoos I am used to, and the lather was more creamy than bubbly. The conditioner is thicker than I am used to. But I was pleased with the performance of both shampoo and conditioner, and that is what counts. I really did not notice a scent, so people with sensitive noses would be pleased with this product. Yes, I would recommend this shampoo and conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Moisturizing, but Overly Scented
customer_reviews.text: When I first tried this product I was impressed by the moisturizing effect and how soft it made my hair, but the scent was too powerful. After a few tries, I just couldn't get over the artificial fragrance, so I opted to pass these along to someone less sensitive. They were impressed by the product, and noted the same awesome effects of moisturizing and softness, and they actually loved the scent. At the end of the day, the product works beautifully, but I believe there is certainly room for improvement in the fragrance department.
customer_reviews.author: jncweller

customer_reviews.title: It's my favorite brand. Beautiful scent. Lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of shampoo and conditioner in this brand. I've tried others. Nothing works as well for me as this. My husband always loved how my hair smelled and the shine and texture is amazing. I have fine, straight, limp hair with no body. My hair is normal to oily within a day of not washing it. Also my hair gets frizzy due to humidity here. But with this shampoo and conditioner, my hair has texture, shine, body, feels clean and bouncy. I can also go a few days without washing it if I want to without looking like I've been living in the rough. I'm sold on it
customer_reviews.author: sherridw42

customer_reviews.title: Leaked and shampoo was opened.
customer_reviews.text: I just received the package today and the shampoo was leaked to the box. It wasn't tighten enough and the sealer was open and stuck on the bottom of the lid. Disappointing. This is the first time I ordered this one because I love the mask of the same brand and would like to try this set. The smell is great. Though the shampoo is not full enough, it's not worth returning. I just hope next time, they consider to put bubble wrap on it and checking the product first before sending. Will update the review when tried it for couple of times. Hope it does great job like the mask.
customer_reviews.author: Emelita Miller

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this last year but something is different.
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is OK. I'll need to try it a few more times to determine the cons. I wish that the conditioner had the same consistency as the shampoo though. The conditioner has the same consistency as this brand leave-in-conditioner which I don't like. My hair isn't moisturized but instead encased in oil to make it appear shiny and healthy. Also, this moisturizer doesn't allow follow-up products to efficiently work due to its content makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for minimizing scalp oil
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old son LOVES this shampoo. It has significantly minimized the oil in his hair, and he refuses to use anything else. He has thick dark hair which normally looks and feels oily within a few hours of shampooing. I have found I can go multiple days without washing my hair if I use this shampoo, but I do not have oily hair so it dries my hair out if I use it exclusively. I purchased just this shampoo from another seller, but it was extremely thin and runny like it had been thinned with water. This one came shinkwrapped with the combo of shampoo and conditioner, possibly directly from the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Wishmom

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss? Definitely a MISS.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a fan. I've been using this exclusively since receiving it July 28, and it has made my hair feel dry and damaged. It knots more frequently than it had previously. I feel like I get a cleaner, smoother, sleeker look using Suave Professionals, and that is so much cheaper for more product than this. This combo is a miss for me. My biggest pro for this, however, is the smell. It smells wonderful! But that's not enough; I will not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: KLK

customer_reviews.title: I really like the conditioner portion. I really hate the shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I have really frizzy hair that tangles very easily and is hard to control. With most conditioners, I am unable to brush my hair after I get out of the shower. With this conditioner, my hair is softer and less frizzy so I can get a brush through my hair. However, I hate the shampoo. I find it to be too harsh and strips my hair of its oils. I continue to buy the conditioner separately, but I do not purchase the combo set that contains the shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Stein

customer_reviews.title: Great for the hair and scalp
customer_reviews.text: Are you losing hair more than normal? That is what was happening to me. My hair was falling out like crazy and getting brittle. I was at a loss. I tried everything. I came across this product and thought "why not, can't hurt anything". WHAT A DIFFERENCE! My hair is now soft and shinier and its no longer falling out by the hand full. I completely recommend this hair product. It is amazimg. It is the only brand I will use now. I have just ordered it for the 3rd time. I absolutely love this product. To the seller: please don't ever discontinue this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alina Zurcher

customer_reviews.title: Works for both adults and kids! Softens hair makes manageable!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product it not only worked well for me but my 6yr old as well! The product arrived quickly too! It made my hair and my daughter hair much more manageable after adding the conditioner. Normally I have to comb through and it hurts but with this it was so easy to comb with conditioner on and then I let it sit for a little and soft and it smells amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Gives hair softness I really enjoy
customer_reviews.text: I visited my daughter and was introduced to this brand, so I decided to try the shampoo and conditioner. I am so happy! The product is thick, long lasting and has a wonderful scent. The most important piece is that it’s perfect for my hair. I have A and B hair that is different after chemo. I used to get my hair reed ever 12-16 weeks. After chemo, I don’t need to, my hair grew back as if it’s already relaxed! This shampoo is gentle and I don’t have lots of hair loss. Since I’m still on a chemo pill, that’s important to me. Be happy with this shampoo with me!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizing natural shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I found this set on Clean Goods when I was looking for a more natural shampoo and conditioner. I have fine wavy/curly hair and avoid sulfates and silicones in hair products so I love that this has a high purity rating on Clean Goods (it’s also free of parabens!). The shampoo and conditioner smell good, but not too strong, and leave my hair soft and moisturized without weighing it down. I would definitely recommend this to anyone in search of a more natural shampoo! If you haven’t used a sulfate-free shampoo before, just keep in mind that it won’t lather as much, but it will clean your hair without drying it out – just work it in with your fingers!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Rejuvenating shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I liked when I previously purchased this product the first time it has a rich lather and smell. It left my hair soft to the touch and made it so shiny. It had such a nice fragrance with all natural ingredients. This second purchase I can speculate that the ingredients in the bottle has changed as stated by other reviews. It had more of a chemical smell and it was more watered down as I used the product alot faster. I love this brand, but it should have the original formula for this shampoo. Something definitely changed. As for the other shampoos of this line, I can say it's still authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette De Alba

customer_reviews.title: Beware....They changed the formula!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this set for over a year. It was my perfect shampoo and conditioner. It left my hair soft and smooth without being heavy. I was running low so I decided to repurchase. BIG MISTAKE. Within the first use I realized the formula was different and it left my hair feeling like straw. It states sulfate free but that is no longer the case- just check the ingredients. What a shame they ruined this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Harper

customer_reviews.title: It smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this Argan shampoo and conditioner set – It smells amazing. My hair went from being frizzy, to straight and shiny and easy to manage. The shampoo is so moisturizing in itself. However, the conditioner does add a little protection and shine when using hair dryers and straighteners. I highly recommend this product! I will def buy again
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ghafoori

customer_reviews.title: No opinion on the quality of the product as of yet just disappointed in the misinformation
customer_reviews.text: Received an email from the seller very quickly after ordering thanking me for the order and offering assistance if any issues. I do have an issue with this product but not one that the seller can help with and one all should know. The ingredients as listed for the Conditioner is NOT accurate and the actual product is missing one important ingredient that I was looking for and what prompted me to purchase this one. No opinion on the quality of the product as of yet just disappointed in the misinformation.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Ihle

customer_reviews.title: Just love it
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive scalp. I am in my late 20s and a male. I have been having a lot of trouble looking for something that works for me. This is it! Love the scent, hair feels sooo much smoother and looks much healthier! Already bought another one lol
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shampoo and conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I have never bought shampoo and conditioner on Amazon. I was using Organix shampoo and conditioner for over 3 years now and I wanted to try something else. I am glad that I tried this one. I was familiar with this brand as I ordered oil from them before. It didn't disappoint me then and it didn't this time neither. My hair feels so soft and healthier. I see natural shine to it and I love it! My daughter also uses it and her tangled hair seems to be more controlled.
customer_reviews.author: Jinny Pearson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brand for a while now, started out with just the slow vera gel & simply fell in love with the rest! Love this set, not only of it's natural ingredients and obviously great smell, but results are just as great! I began to notice a difference within my hair, for tree texture, length, durability & protection. Which this set simply has it all! I had to just acquire more of their great products to my home needs. Most def reccomend!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Von Quinn

customer_reviews.title: A quality product that leaves hair silkly and smelling great but shampoo was drying for me.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this company's quality products. Unfortunately, the shampoo left my hair too dry though. I also purchased "coal tar" shampoo with them and use the conditioner with this shampoo. This is less drying to my hair. Sadly, neither shampoo helped with my scalp itchiness and bumbs as hoped but I can tell this is a great, quality product as it leaves my hair looking silky and healthy when used with the coal tar shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M. Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Best shampoo/conditioner ever
customer_reviews.text: Seriously this stuff is gold. Smells amazing, barely any and it lathers great and goes a long way. My hair is so soft and silky even after just bleaching/coloring my hair. Highly recommend. Don’t know if the bad reviews are fake or if they just got a bad batch somehow. I’ve ordered it twice and both times were the same #amazing
customer_reviews.author: brooke

customer_reviews.title: Hair already feels softer after 3 uses...
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this product for about a week, but noticed after only 3 uses that the ends of my hair no longer feel like straw. I can't comment on the claims that it will make my hair grow faster/help stop breakage as I haven't been using it long enough to know, yet. I'll update my review when I've gone through a full bottle of the product, but I'm already very pleased with the results. I'm sensitive to strong scents and I did find this product to have a heavier fragrance, but it's not unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany P.

customer_reviews.title: More then 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I’m a guy with fluffy dry hair, used probably 20 different fairly expensive shampoos and conditioners, my shampoo and conditioners were more expensive then my wife’s if that’s saying anything. THIS STUFF, this stuff is fantastic I have never seen my hair the way it is now, since my first purchase this has been reordered 4 times and my wife loves it, which explains why it keeps disappearing! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Smith

customer_reviews.title: It smells wonderful but dried my hair
customer_reviews.text: It smells wonderful & is a good product. I have to use way more conditioner then most due to longer hair. Otherwise it s a good product Upon finishing the bottle I noticed more hair loss then normal. Also seemed to have dried out my hair. This could be only my results as I know everyone has good & bad. I will not buy again but doesn't mean this isn't a good product. I know there is alot of comments on both side. It does smell nice, it lathers up decent, I had to use extra conditioner but seemed to still be dried out.
customer_reviews.author: MrsB

customer_reviews.title: Watery Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product before and it was GREAT! This most recent shipment was not the same. The shampoo is the consistency of water and really unusable. I’m not sure if it got too hot or what caused it. I know once it was delivered I brought it inside. I gave it two stars because the conditioner was consistent with my previous orders.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa McMurtry

customer_reviews.title: Dry and Rough experience
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the worst hair products purchased. I have thick and dry hair and I thought this would be a moisturizing experience.; it was not. After washing my hair and using their conditioner, my hair was very dry and crisp to the touch. You never want to hear the word "crisp" when you touch your hair. DO NOT buy this product if you like your hair soft and manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Ericka C

customer_reviews.title: Maybe good for no dye hair.
customer_reviews.text: Smells good and makes very light suds. I will finish the products but doubt that I would purchase it again. My hair was very tangled and needed to use to much conditioner to detangle. I'll continue to use Tresemme Keratin with Marula oil. Less expensive.. works better for my hair.. larger bottles and I don't need to use as much product.
customer_reviews.author: majestic

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love for broken thin hair
customer_reviews.text: I desperately needed something for my broken, over heat product treated hair. I decided to try this argan oil shampoo and conditioner. I absolutely love it! I use a little shampoo and massage it into my scalp and hair. Then I massage the conditioner into my scalp and hair and leave it in until the end of my shower. I love how soft it leaves my hair. It seems to be working really well on rejuvenating my hair too.
customer_reviews.author: ange8094

customer_reviews.title: Not deep moisture
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on good reviews and having a need for something that is moisturizing. I have dry hair due to color and highlights and also very long hair I thought this would help restore some moisture in my hair based on the reviews. unfortunately the shampoo seems very watery compared to what I’m used to and the shampoo is more expensive than the usual drugstore brand that I use. I don’t feel like it does as good of a job so I decided to return it even though it does smell really good.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Silky smooth
customer_reviews.text: I used my shampoo and conditioner for the first time last night. I had to use a little bit more than recommend ( my hair is to the middle of my back), it took a bit for it to lather. I was shocked when I rinsed my hair out, how silky smooth it was! Even after I dried and straightened my hair it’s been smooth and soft all day. It doesn’t help at all with giving your hair any volume boost, but I’m not too worried about that right now. I’m just worried about getting my hair stronger and healthy. Hoping this works!
customer_reviews.author: HKK

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Not only are the shampoo and conditioner the exact same product, they are awful and very drying. Will never purchase again! A huge waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanna vega

customer_reviews.title: Great Combo but Conditioner is a Bit Difficult to Get Out of the Bottle
customer_reviews.text: Both of these smell great and really do leave my hair feeling great. My son also uses it and it leaves his hair feeling great too! My only complaint is that the conditioner is a bit hard to get out of the bottle. Since it is a bit more thick you either have to leave it upside down all the time so that it's readily available or you have to take off the cap so that you can hit it against the wall until it comes out.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Corona

customer_reviews.title: This shampoo and conditioner is amazing! I started losing hair when I was 17 ...
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo and conditioner is amazing! I started losing hair when I was 17 and tried every single product I could find, but nothing worked. However after only going through half the bottle I could already see a huge difference in the amount of hair that was coming in and not falling out. I am so excited about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca

customer_reviews.title: Great clean and conditioner for your hair
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this Shampoo and conditioner. I love the fresh smell and with just a small amount you can get a good lather on the hair. The shampoo really cleaned all the product out of my hair. And what the shampoo strips out the conditioner puts back leaving my hair soft with a natural shine. I am so happy I tried this product. Will look to see what other products the company sells. Very happy consumer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, but that's about it.
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping to find a more affordable option for natural shampoo/conditioner, so I purchased these. I am so disappointed. The shampoo lathers, but somehow doesn't seem to move through my hair, so I have to add more shampoo to get to the ends of my hair. The conditioner isn't very moisturizing and my hair is always so tangled afterward. Wish I could return this product; it's awful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hair gets oily faster than other shampoos I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this shampoo is so so. It actually makes my hair oily faster for some reasons. Perhaps it’s too moisturizing? But to the point of oiliness. I wash my hair on alternating days and with other shampoos, my hair won’t be too oily on the second day. The smell is nice tho. Maybe it just doesn’t suit my hair type.
customer_reviews.author: Iiivv

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: The photo makes it look like you're getting big, thick bottles but they're actually WAY skinnier so you might not be getting as much as you think. Works alright I guess I haven't noticed much of a difference from the drug store shampoos and conditioners.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: After a few weeks I noticed build up.
customer_reviews.text: I switch from my salon shampoo (Biolage by Matrix) because I wanted something natural and less expensive. At first I loved it. It smells great and felt refreshing to wash my hair. After 4 weeks and 3/4 of the bottle used I now feel like my hair has build up and doesnt feel clean like it used to. I dont use any other hair products so I know it's either the shampoo or conditioner. I'm going back to Matrix biolage.
customer_reviews.author: Sue & Kate

customer_reviews.title: Smell is great! Hair is healthy!
customer_reviews.text: I am loving these products! The shampoo I feel like it does a great job cleaning my hair, without too much foam going all over the place while scrubbing. The conditioner is incredible and makes my hair feels so soft, well easily rinses out in the shower. I love the smell as well as the fact that it is sulfate free, paraben free, and cruelty free!!!
customer_reviews.author: EF

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Very average product. Size is smaller than the stretched out picture would have you think. Shampoo has a very thin and watery texture, kinda weird. Overall does it’s job but doesn’t seem to make my hair noticeably softer. It’s actually a little drying.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Herman

customer_reviews.title: I got compliments about my hair after using
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo makes my hair look silky smooth (in combination with my flat iron). A co-worker was walking behind me last week and noted that my hair looks nice, and what am I doing differently? The conditioner is thick like the tubes of conditioner that come with hair dye. This shampoo is worth the price; I now have it on subscription through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Natural clean.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for my hair of course. I have a very sensitive scalp as many different shampoos make my head itch. This one I enjoyed and it didn’t make my head itch. I also found that the scent is a pretty clean scent but it was a little strong to me. Again I’m just sensitive to smells as well. But I did enjoy it and would definitely use it again! I have been looking for a more natural shampoo. I have also used color in my hair and I didn’t find this to effect the color but it did help make it feel healthier. I would recommend this product it cleaned my hair very well.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Get shiny hair but also gives u scalp acne
customer_reviews.text: This works amazing for dry hair. It made my hair very shiny and healthy. However, it also gave me lots of acne on my scalp and neck! I have never had acne problem in my life. So now i am trying to maybe alternate between using this once a week and my older shampoo rest of the time. Acne started after couple washes and has continued for a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
